AutoVariable.label: Aim key
AutoVariable.tooltip: Key which needs to be pressed to activate the action below.

AutoVariable.label: Silent
AutoVariable.tooltip: Stops your crosshair from moving on your screen. Crosshair movement is still visible for spectators.

AutoVariable.label: Slow aimbot
AutoVariable.tooltip: Controls how quickly the aimbot moves your crosshair.

AutoVariable.label: FOV
AutoVariable.tooltip: Restricts the aimbot to a certain FOV from your crosshair.

AutoVariable.label: FOV circle
AutoVariable.tooltip: Shows the Aimbot's FOV.

AutoVariable.label: FOV opacity
AutoVariable.tooltip: Controls the FOV circle's opacity.

AutoVariable.label: Miss chance
AutoVariable.tooltip: % chance the aimbot will intentionally miss.

AutoVariable.label: Zoomed only
AutoVariable.tooltip: If applicable, the aimbot will only shoot if you are scoped in.

AutoVariable.label: Flip viewmodel
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically flip the viewmodel for projectile weapons.

LabeledObject.label: Priority mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: Who should the aimbot prioritize when multiple targets are in FOV?

LabeledObject.label: Hitbox mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: Which hitboxes should the aimbot target? Auto: target the head if the current weapon can deal headshot damage and if the headshot multiplier is necessary to kill the target; otherwise, the spine will be targeted. Closest: target the closest hitbox. Static: target the hitbox set below.

LabeledObject.label: Hitbox
LabeledObject.tooltip: Sets the hitbox used if the above is set to 'Static'.

AutoVariable.label: Max range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Entities further than this distance will not be targeted. Measured in Hammer units.

LabeledObject.label: All Hiitboxes
LabeledObject.tooltip: This will vischeck as many hitboxes as it can on the target to see if it can shoot. This will reduce your FPS.

AutoVariable.label: Assistance only
AutoVariable.tooltip: Aimbot will only activate if your mouse has moved in the last half second.

AutoVariable.label: Lock target
AutoVariable.tooltip: Lock onto a target until they die or leave your FOV.

AutoVariable.label: Rage only
AutoVariable.tooltip: Only target players set to RAGE.

AutoVariable.label: Ignore Vaccinator
AutoVariable.tooltip: Ignore targets that have uber Vaccinator resistance against current weapon type.

AutoVariable.label: Enable autoshoot
AutoVariable.tooltip: Make the aimbot automatically fire your weapon.

AutoVariable.label: Wait for charge
AutoVariable.tooltip: Hold fire until a single shot is enough to kill the target.

AutoVariable.label: Autoshoot disguised
AutoVariable.tooltip: Allow autoshoot while you are disguised

AutoVariable.label: Auto spin-up
AutoVariable.tooltip: Spin up the minigun automatically if an enemy is found.

AutoVariable.label: Auto zoom
AutoVariable.tooltip: Intelligently zoom if applicable to current weapon type.

AutoVariable.label: Auto unzoom
AutoVariable.tooltip: Intelligently unzoom if applicable to current weapon type.

LabeledObject.label: Spectator mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: Never: the settings below will never override main aimbot settings. Firstperson: enable below settings if at least one person is spectating you in first person. Spectated: enable below settings if you are being spectated at all.

AutoVariable.label: Aimbot enable
AutoVariable.tooltip: Should the aimbot be enabled based on the above?

AutoVariable.label: Spectated FOV
AutoVariable.tooltip: FOV for the aimbot when in spectated mode.

AutoVariable.label: Spectated slow
AutoVariable.tooltip: Controls how quickly the aimbot moves your crosshair while in spectated mode.

AutoVariable.label: Enable backtracking
AutoVariable.tooltip: Allow hitting enemies where they were in the past.

AutoVariable.label: Aim at backtracking
AutoVariable.tooltip: Aim at backtrack ticks.

AutoVariable.label: Aim at only the last tick
AutoVariable.tooltip: Aim at only the last backtrack tick. !DISABLING THIS MAY CAUSE LAG!

AutoVariable.label: Ping reducer
AutoVariable.tooltip: Try to reduce your ping to the number set below.

AutoVariable.label: Fake latency
AutoVariable.tooltip: Amount of fake latency.

AutoVariable.label: Draw backtrack
AutoVariable.tooltip: Shows an on-screen icon for ticks.

LabeledObject.label: Backtrack slots
LabeledObject.tooltip: Which weapon slots should have backtracking enabled?
